document.heading: Street Sweeping Improvement Enforcement Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-217, the “Street Sweeping Improvement Enforcement Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-396 which was referred to Public Worked and Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 1, 2008, and June 3, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 24, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-417 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-217 became effective on August 15, 2008.
